trans-unit.source: Statement-based replication (SBR) works as follows: SQL statements are executed on the master (possibly concurrently). They are written into the binlog (this fixes their ordering, "a serialization"). The slave then reads the binlog and executes the statements in their binlog order.
trans-unit.target: 基于语句的复制（SBR）的工作方式如下：SQL语句在主数据库上执行（可能同时执行）。它们被写入二进制日志（这将修复其顺序，即“序列化”）。然后，从站读取binlog并以其binlog顺序执行语句。

trans-unit.source: CHANGE MASTER TO is used to create and change connections.

trans-unit.source: CHANGE MASTER has a new option, master_use_gtid=[current_pos|slave_pos|no]. When enabled (set to current_pos or slave_pos), the slave will connect to the master using the GTID position. When disabled (set to "no"), the old-style binlog filename/offset position is used to decide where to start replicating when connecting. Unlike in the old-style, when GTID is enabled, the values of the MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS options are not updated per received event in master_info_file file.
trans-unit.target: CHANGE MASTER有一个新选项， master_use_gtid=[current_pos|slave_pos|no] 。启用后（设置为current_pos或slave_pos），从站将使用GTID位置连接到主站。禁用（设置为“ no”）时，旧式binlog文件名/偏移量位置用于确定连接时从何处开始复制。与旧样式不同，启用GTID后，master_info_file文件中的每个接收到的事件都不会更新MASTER_LOG_FILE和MASTER_LOG_POS选项的值。

trans-unit.source: Clients and utilities verify a server certificate by checking the server's host name and IP address against certain attributes in the certificate. trans-unit.source: COLUMN_CHECK is used to check a column's integrity. When it encounters an error it does not return illegal format errors but returns false instead. It also checks integrity more thoroughly and finds errors in the dynamic column internal structures which might not be found by other functions.
trans-unit.target: COLUMN_CHECK用于检查列的完整性。遇到错误时，它不会返回非法格式错误，而是返回false。它还会更彻底地检查完整性，并在动态列内部结构中发现其他函数可能找不到的错误。

trans-unit.source: Galera has been upgraded from Galera 3 to Galera 4.
trans-unit.target: Galera已从Galera 3 升级到Galera 4。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Galera Cluster builds include a built-in plugin called wsrep. Prior to MariaDB 10.4.3, this plugin was internally considered an XA-capablestorage engine. Consequently, these MariaDB Galera Cluster builds have multiple XA-capable storage engines by default, even if the only "real" storage engine that supports external XA transactions enabled on these builds by default is InnoDB. Therefore, when using one these builds MariaDB would be forced to use a transaction coordinator log by default, which could have performance implications.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Galera Cluster构建包含一个名为 wsrep 的内置插件。在MariaDB 10.4.3之前，该插件在内部被视为具有XA功能的存储引擎。因此，这些MariaDB Galera Cluster构建默认情况下具有多个具有XA功能的存储引擎，即使默认情况下支持这些构建中启用的外部XA事务的唯一“真实”存储引擎为InnoDB。因此，在使用这些构建时，默认情况下，MariaDB将被迫使用事务协调器日志，这可能会对性能产生影响。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Galera Cluster does not currently replicate the original GTID with the write set except in cases where the transaction was originally applied by a slave SQL thread. Each node independently generates its own GTID for each write set in most cases. See MDEV-10715 about that.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Galera Cluster当前不使用写入集复制原始GTID，除非事务最初是由从属SQL线程应用的。在大多数情况下，每个节点都会为每个写集独立生成自己的GTID。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-10715。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Galera Cluster does not support XA transactions. See MDEV-10532 for more information on that. The request to implement that feature is being tracked at MDEV-17099.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Galera Cluster不支持XA事务。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-10532。在MDEV-17099上跟踪实现该功能的请求。

trans-unit.source: Galera Cluster is now included by default.
trans-unit.target: 现在默认包括Galera Cluster。

trans-unit.source: Galera Cluster is tightly integrated into InnoDB storage engine (it also supports Percona's XtraDB which is a modified version of InnoDB). Galera Cluster does not work with any other storage engines, including MyRocks (or TokuDB for example).
trans-unit.target: Galera Cluster已紧密集成到InnoDB存储引擎中（它还支持Percona的XtraDB，它是InnoDB的修改版）。Galera Cluster无法与任何其他存储引擎一起使用，包括MyRocks（例如TokuDB）。

trans-unit.source: Galera (including Percona XtraDB Cluster) provides a way to do "write scaling", but it may add more complexity than benefits. Probably the "Extreme Design" is the outline for how to ingest on multiple Galera nodes. Special care needs to be taken on when to use (or not use) transactions, and how to handle a 'deadlock' on COMMIT (which is key to Galera's performance).
trans-unit.target: Galera（包括Percona XtraDB群集）提供了一种进行“写入扩展”的方法，但是它可能会增加复杂性，而不是带来好处。也许“极限设计”是如何在多个Galera节点上提取的概述。需要特别注意何时使用（或不使用）事务，以及如何处理COMMIT上的“僵局”（这是Galera性能的关键）。

trans-unit.source: Generated columns do not currently support online DDL for all of the same operations that are supported for "real" columns.
trans-unit.target: 对于“实际”列支持的所有相同操作，生成的列当前不支持在线DDL。

trans-unit.source: GeometryCollection has specialized zero-, one-, and two-dimensional collection classes named MultiPoint, MultiLineString, and MultiPolygon for modeling geometries corresponding to collections of Points, LineStrings, and Polygons, respectively. MultiCurve and MultiSurface are introduced as abstract superclasses that generalize the collection interfaces to handle Curves and Surfaces.
trans-unit.target: GeometryCollection具有名为MultiPoint，MultiLineString和MultiPolygon的专用零维，一维和二维收集类，用于分别建模与点，线串和多边形集合相对应的几何形状。MultiCurve和MultiSurface是作为抽象超类引入的，它们抽象化了收集接口以处理曲线和曲面。

trans-unit.target: InnoDB是一个很好的常规事务存储引擎。它是MariaDB 10.2（以及MySQL）的默认存储引擎。对于早期版本，XtraDB是InnoDB的性能增强分支，通常是首选。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB overhead Even 100M blocks is quite manageable in today's hardware. Once things are cached, most operations would take only a few milliseconds. A trillion blocks would work, but most operations would hit the disk a few times -- only a few times.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB开销在当今的硬件中，即使100M的块也相当可管理。缓存完所有内容后，大多数操作只需几毫秒。一万亿个块可以工作，但是大多数操作都会几次（仅几次）击中磁盘。

trans-unit.source: INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE statements upon tables with multiple primary or unique keys, as the order that the keys are checked in, and which affect the rows chosen to update, is not deterministic. Before MariaDB 5.5.24, these statements were not regarded as unsafe. In MariaDB 10.0 this warning has been removed as we always check keys in the same order on master and slave.
trans-unit.target: 在具有多个主键或唯一键的表上执行INSERT ... ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE语句不是确定性的，因为签入键的顺序会影响选择更新的行。在MariaDB 5.5.24之前，这些声明并不被认为是不安全的。在MariaDB 10.0中，此警告已删除，因为我们始终以相同的顺序检查主服务器和从属服务器上的按键。

trans-unit.source: PARTITIONs in MariaDB and MySQL sort of give you a way to have two clustered indexes. So, if we could slice up (partition) the globe in one dimension and use ordinary indexing in the other dimension, maybe we can get something approximating a 2D index. This 2D approach keeps the number of disk hits significantly lower than 1D approaches, thereby speeding up "find nearest" queries.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB和MySQL中的PARTITIONs可以让您拥有两个聚集索引的方式。因此，如果我们可以在一个维度上对地球进行分割（划分），而在另一维度上使用普通索引，则也许我们可以获得一些接近2D索引的内容。这种2D方法使磁盘命中次数大大低于1D方法，从而加快了“查找最近”查询的速度。

trans-unit.source: Partitioned tables cannot contain foreign keys, and cannot be referenced by a foreign key.
trans-unit.target: 分区表不能包含外键，也不能被外键引用。

trans-unit.source: Partitioned tables cannot contain fulltext indexes, even if the storage engine supports them.
trans-unit.target: 分区表不能包含全文索引，即使存储引擎支持它们也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Partitioned tables do not support geometric types.
trans-unit.target: 分区表不支持几何类型。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup and Percona XtraBackup only see transactions that have been flushed to the redo log. With the group commit improvements, there may be a small delay (defined by the binlog_commit_wait_usec system variable) between when a commit happens and when the commit will be included in a backup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup和Percona XtraBackup仅看到已刷新到重做日志的事务。通过改进组提交，在何时发生提交以及何时将提交包含在备份中之间可能会有一个很小的延迟（由 binlog_commit_wait_usec 系统变量定义）。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup is a fork of Percona XtraBackup designed to work with encrypted and compressed tables and other MariaDB enhancements. There are many bug fixes, such as MDEV-13807, and some unsafe or redundant options have been removed. Mariabackup is the recommended backup method for MariaDB servers.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup是Percona XtraBackup的分支，旨在与加密和压缩表以及其他MariaDB增强功能一起使用。有许多错误修复程序，例如MDEV-13807，并且一些不安全或多余的选项已被删除。Mariabackup是MariaDB服务器推荐的备份方法。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup supports InnoDB page compression.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup支持InnoDB页面压缩。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup is a fork of Percona XtraBackup with added support for MariaDB 10.1compression and data-at-rest encryption. It is included with MariaDB 10.1.23 and later.

trans-unit.source: MEMORY tables are a good choice for data that needs to be accessed often, and is rarely updated. Being in memory, it's not suitable for critical data or for storage, but if data can be moved to memory for reading without needing to be regenerated often, if at all, it can provide a significant performance boost.
trans-unit.target: 对于需要经常访问且很少更新的数据，MEMORY表是不错的选择。在内存中，它不适合用于关键数据或存储，但是如果可以将数据移动到内存中以进行读取而无需经常重新生成，则根本可以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: MEMORY does not write data on-disk (all rows are lost on crash) and is best-used for read-only caches of data from other tables, or for temporary work areas. With the default XtraDB and other storage engines having good caching, there is less need for this engine than in the past.
trans-unit.target: MEMORY不会在磁盘上写数据（崩溃时所有行都会丢失），并且最适合用于其他表中数据的只读缓存或临时工作区。在默认的XtraDB和其他具有良好缓存的存储引擎的情况下，与过去相比，对该引擎的需求减少了。

trans-unit.source: MyISAM has a small footprint and allows for easy copying between systems. MyISAM is MySQL's oldest storage engine. There is usually little reason to use it except for legacy purposes. Aria is MariaDB's more modern improvement.

trans-unit.target: MyISAM将在整个操作过程中锁定表，因此该表无法执行任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: mysqldump performs a logical backup. It is the most flexible way to perform a backup and restore, and a good choice when the data size is relatively small.
trans-unit.target: mysqldump执行逻辑备份。这是执行备份和还原的最灵活的方法，并且是当数据量较小时的理想选择。

trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，mysqldump将忽略S3表。如果 mysqldump 使用 --copy-s3-tables 选项运行，则生成的文件将包含针对类似Aria表的CREATE语句，后跟该表数据，并以 ALTER TABLE xxx ENGINE=S3 结尾。

trans-unit.source: Indexing is one of the main ways to optimize queries. Key columns, in particular when they are used to join tables, should be indexed. But what should be done for columns that have only few distinct values? If they are randomly placed in the table they should not be indexed because reading many rows in random order can be slower than reading the entire table sequentially. However, if the values are sorted or clustered, indexing can be acceptable because CONNECT indexes store the values in the order they appear into the table and this will make retrieving them almost as fast as reading them sequentially.
trans-unit.target: 索引编制是优化查询的主要方法之一。键列，尤其是用于连接表的键列，应建立索引。但是，对于只有很少几个不同值的列应该怎么做？如果将它们随机放置在表中，则不应为它们建立索引，因为以随机顺序读取许多行可能比顺序读取整个表要慢。但是，如果对值进行排序或聚类，则索引可以接受，因为CONNECT索引按照它们在表中出现的顺序存储值，这将使检索它们的速度几乎与顺序读取它们一样快。

trans-unit.source: idle_transaction_timeout affects all transactions, idle_write_transaction_timeout affects write transactions only and idle_readonly_transaction_timeout affects read transactions only. The latter two variables work independently. However, if either is set along with idle_transaction_timeout, the settings for idle_write_transaction_timeout or idle_readonly_transaction_timeout will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: idle_transaction_timeout影响所有交易，idle_write_transaction_timeout只影响写事务和idle_readonly_transaction_timeout会影响只读事务。后两个变量独立工作。但是，如果将其中之一与idle_transaction_timeout一起设置，则idle_write_transaction_timeout或idle_readonly_transaction_timeout的设置将优先。

trans-unit.source: Stored programs and views always use the SQL_MODE that was active when they were created. This means that users can safely change session or global SQL_MODE; the stored programs they use will still work as usual.
trans-unit.target: 存储的程序和视图始终使用创建时处于活动状态的SQL_MODE。这意味着用户可以安全地更改会话或全局SQL_MODE。他们使用的存储程序仍将照常工作。

trans-unit.source: Stored routines parameters and local variables can always be set to NULL. If no DEFAULT value is specified for a local variable, its initial value will be NULL. If no value is assigned to an OUT parameter in a stored procedure, NULL is assigned at the end of the procedure.
trans-unit.target: 存储的例程参数和局部变量始终可以设置为NULL。如果未为局部变量指定DEFAULT值，则其初始值为NULL。如果在存储过程中没有将值分配给OUT参数，则在过程结束时分配NULL。

trans-unit.source: Subqueries are not supported in expressions for generated columns because the underlying data can change.
trans-unit.target: 生成的列的表达式中不支持子查询，因为基础数据可以更改。

trans-unit.source: Subqueries using the EXISTS keyword will return true if the subquery returns any rows. Conversely, subqueries using NOT EXISTS will return true only if the subquery returns no rows from the table.
trans-unit.target: 子查询使用 EXISTS 关键字将返回 true ，如果子查询返回任何行。相反，仅当子查询不返回表中的任何行时，使用 NOT EXISTS 的子查询才返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Subqueries using the ALL keyword will return true if the comparison returns true for each row returned by the subquery, or the subquery returns no rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果比较为子查询返回的每一行返回 true ，则使用ALL关键字的子查询将返回 true ，或者子查询不返回任何行。

trans-unit.source: Subqueries using the ANY keyword will return true if the comparison returns true for at least one row returned by the subquery.
trans-unit.target: 如果对于子查询返回的至少一行比较返回 true ，则使用ANY关键字的子查询将返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: sysVinit and systemd are the most common Linux service managers. launchd is used in MacOS X. Upstart is a less common service manager.
trans-unit.target: sysVinit和systemd是最常见的Linux服务管理器。launchd会在MacOS X上使用暴发户是一个不太常见的服务经理。

trans-unit.source: sysVinit and systemd are the most common service managers. Upstart is a less common service manager.
trans-unit.target: sysVinit和systemd是最常见的服务管理器。Upstart是一种不太常见的服务管理器。

trans-unit.source: Admin statements ANALYZE, CHECK and REPAIR will not be logged to the binary log under read-only.
trans-unit.target: 管理员语句ANALYZE，CHECK和REPAIR将不会以只读方式记录到二进制日志中。

trans-unit.source: System-versioning extended with support for application-time periods.
trans-unit.target: 系统版本扩展了对应用程序时间段的支持。

trans-unit.source: TEXT and BLOB columns are stored with a pointer (4 or 8 bytes) + a 1-4 bytes length. The TEXT data is only stored once. This means that internally TEXT uses less memory for each open table but instead has the additional overhead that each TEXT object needs to be allocated and freed for each row access (with some caching in between).
trans-unit.target: TEXT和BLOB列以指针（4或8个字节）+ 1-4个字节的长度存储。该TEXT数据只存储一次。这意味着 TEXT 内部为每个打开的表使用较少的内存，但具有额外的开销，即需要为每个行访问分配和释放每个 TEXT 对象（之间有一些缓存）。

trans-unit.source: Time zones are offset relative to UTC. For example, time in Tonga is UTC + 13, so 03h00 UTC will be 16h00 in Tonga.
trans-unit.target: 时区相对于UTC偏移。例如，汤加的时间为UTC + 13，因此，汤加的03h00 UTC将为16h00。

trans-unit.source: TIME_TO_SEC() and UNIX_TIMESTAMP() preserve microseconds of the argument. These functions will return a decimal number if the result non-zero datetime precision and an integer otherwise (for backward compatibility).
trans-unit.target: TIME_TO_SEC（）和UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）保留参数的微秒。如果结果的日期时间精度为非零，则这些函数将返回一个十进制数，否则返回一个整数（以实现向后兼容）。

trans-unit.source: TIMESTAMP columns are always NOT NULL, and display sizes are discarded
trans-unit.target: TIMESTAMP列始终不为NULL，并且显示大小被丢弃

trans-unit.source: TINYBLOB, BLOB, MEDIUMBLOB, LONGBLOB
trans-unit.target: 天黑，BLOB，MEDIUMBLOB，LONGBLOB

trans-unit.source: TINYBLOB, TINYTEXT
trans-unit.target: TINYBLOB，TINYTEXT

trans-unit.source: TINYTEXT, MEDIUMTEXT, LONGTEXT
trans-unit.target: 小文字，中文字，长文字

trans-unit.source: Differences between TokuDB from Tokutek.com and the TokuDB version in MariaDB from MariaDB.org.
trans-unit.target: Tokutek.com的TokuDB与MariaDB.org的MariaDB中的TokuDB版本之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB has been split into a separate package, mariadb-plugin-tokudb.
trans-unit.target: TokuDB已拆分为一个单独的程序包mariadb-plugin-tokudb。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB is a transactional storage engine which is optimized for workloads that do not fit in memory, and provides a good compression ratio.
trans-unit.target: TokuDB是一个事务存储引擎，针对不适合内存的工作负载进行了优化，并提供了良好的压缩率。

trans-unit.source: TokuDB is a viable engine if you must have UUIDs (even non-type-1) in a huge table. TokuDB is available in MariaDB as a 'standard' engine, making the barrier to entry very low. There are a small number of differences between InnoDB and TokuDB; I will not go into them here.
trans-unit.target: 如果您必须在巨大的表中包含UUID（甚至是非type-1），TokuDB也是可行的引擎。MariaDB提供了TokuDB作为“标准”引擎的功能，这使得进入门槛非常低。InnoDB和TokuDB 之间存在少量差异；我不会在这里讨论它们。

trans-unit.source: UNLOCK TABLES explicitly releases any table locks held by the current session.
trans-unit.target: UNLOCK TABLES显式释放当前会话持有的所有表锁。

trans-unit.source: Triggers can also update data. The slave uses the DEFINER attribute to determine which user is taken to have created the trigger.
trans-unit.target: 触发器也可以更新数据。从服务器使用DEFINER属性来确定创建触发器的用户。

trans-unit.source: Triggers for UPDATE and DELETE statements are not activated.
trans-unit.target: 触发器的 UPDATE 和 DELETE 语句不激活。

trans-unit.source: Triggers on DELETE and INSERT will be activated by REPLACE.
trans-unit.target: REPLACE 将激活 DELETE 和 INSERT 上的触发器。

trans-unit.source: Triggers with the FOR EACH ROW clause do not apply, since the tables have no rows.
trans-unit.target: 带有 FOR EACH ROW 子句的触发器不适用，因为表没有行。

trans-unit.source: Triggers work in the same way, except that they are always assumed to be deterministic for logging purposes, even if this is obviously not the case, such as when they use the UUID function.
trans-unit.target: 触发器以相同的方式工作，除了触发器始终被认为是确定性的（即使是显然不是这种情况）（例如，当它们使用UUID函数时），也可以用于记录日志。

trans-unit.source: TRIM - removes all given prefixes or suffixes
trans-unit.target: TRIM-删除所有给定的前缀或后缀

trans-unit.source: Undo log record is too big.
trans-unit.target: 撤消日志记录太大。

trans-unit.source: UNHEX Now it will fit in 16 bytes: BINARY(16)
trans-unit.target: UNHEX现在它将适合16个字节：BINARY（16）

trans-unit.source: UNINSTALL PLUGIN uninstalls a single installed plugin, while UNINSTALL SONAME uninstalls all plugins belonging to a given library.
trans-unit.target: UNINSTALL PLUGIN会卸载单个已安装的插件，而UNINSTALL SONAME会卸载属于给定库的所有插件。

trans-unit.target: UNIX_TIMESTAMP（）（无参数）

trans-unit.target: 基于语句的复制的不安全语句。如果此警告频繁发生，则会对其进行限制以防止日志溢出。

trans-unit.source: UPDATE or DELETE can't be performed on Sequence objects.
trans-unit.target: 无法对Sequence对象执行UPDATE或DELETE。

trans-unit.source: UPDATE statements that use LIMIT, since the order of the returned rows is unspecified. This applies even to statements using an ORDER BY clause, which are deterministic (a known bug). However, since MariaDB 10.0.11, LIMIT 0 is an exception to this rule (see MDEV-6170), and these statements are safe for replication.
trans-unit.target: 使用LIMIT的UPDATE语句，因为未指定返回行的顺序。这甚至适用于使用ORDER BY子句的语句，这些语句是确定性的（已知错误）。但是，由于MariaDB 10.0.11， LIMIT 0 是此规则的例外（请参阅MDEV-6170），并且这些语句对于复制是安全的。

trans-unit.source: User-defined functions (UDFs) are not supported in expressions for generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 生成的列的表达式中不支持用户定义的函数（UDF）。

trans-unit.source: User-defined functions (UDFs) are supported in expressions for generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 生成的列的表达式中支持用户定义的函数（UDF）。

trans-unit.source: User-defined functions allow MariaDB to be extended with a new function that works like a native (built-in) MariaDB function such as ABS() or CONCAT(). There are alternative ways to add a new function: writing a native function (which requires modifying and compiling the server source code), or writing a stored function.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的函数允许使用新函数扩展MariaDB，该新函数的工作方式类似于本机（内置）MariaDB函数，例如ABS（）或CONCAT（）。添加新功能的方法有多种：编写本机功能（需要修改和编译服务器源代码），或编写存储的功能。

trans-unit.source: User-defined variables are NULL until a value is explicitly assigned.
trans-unit.target: 在明确指定值之前，用户定义的变量为NULL。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 introduced a performance improvement related to group commit that affects the performance of flushing InnoDB transactions when the binary log is enabled.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0引入了与组提交有关的性能改进，当启用二进制日志时，该性能会影响刷新InnoDB事务的性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 introduced global transaction IDs (GTIDs) for replication. It is generally recommended to use (GTIDs) from MariaDB 10.0, as this has a number of benefits. All that is needed is to add the MASTER_USE_GTID option to the CHANGE MASTER statement, for example:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0引入了用于复制的全局事务ID（GTID）。通常建议使用MariaDB 10.0中的（GTID），因为这样做有很多好处。所需要做的只是将 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项添加到 CHANGE MASTER 语句，例如：

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 introduced replication with global transaction IDs. These have a number of benefits, and it is generally recommended to use this feature from MariaDB 10.0.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0引入了具有全局事务ID的复制。这些有很多好处，通常建议使用MariaDB 10.0中的此功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 introduced the FULL and "connection_name" options to allow you to connect to many masters at the same time.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0引入了 FULL 和 "connection_name" 选项，使您可以同时连接到许多主机。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 supports parallel applying of queries on slaves. You can enable this with slave-parallel-threads=#. Note that this works only if your master is MariaDB 10.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0支持在从属服务器上并行应用查询。您可以使用slave-parallel-threads =＃启用它。请注意，这仅在您的主数据库为MariaDB 10.0或更高版本时才有效。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0 supports the SQL standard and ODBC syntaxes for DATE, TIME and TIMESTAMP literals.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0支持 DATE ， TIME 和 TIMESTAMP 文字的SQL标准和ODBC语法。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 (which is based on MySQL 5.6) included encryption and variable-size page compression before MySQL 5.7 introduced them.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1（基于MySQL 5.6）在MySQL 5.7引入加密和可变大小页面压缩之前就已将它们加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 and above has a feature called wsrep GTID mode. When this mode is enabled, MariaDB uses some tricks to try to associate each Galera Cluster write set with a GTID that is globally unique, but that is also consistent for that write set on each cluster node. These tricks work in some cases, but GTIDs can still become inconsistent among cluster nodes.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1及更高版本具有称为wsrep GTID模式的功能。启用此模式后，MariaDB将使用一些技巧来尝试将每个Galera Cluster写入集与全局唯一的GTID相关联，但对于每个集群节点上的该写入集也是一致的。这些技巧在某些情况下有效，但是GTID在群集节点之间仍然可能变得不一致。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 and above is compiled using cmake. You can configure your build simply by running cmake using special option, i.e.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1及更高版本使用cmake进行编译。您可以通过使用特殊选项运行cmake来简单地配置构建，即

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 includes several improvements to the ORDER BY optimizer.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1包括对ORDER BY优化器的一些改进。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 introduced features that are exclusive to MariaDB, such as InnoDB Page Compression and Data-at-Rest Encryption. These exclusive features have been very popular with MariaDB users. However, existing backup solutions from the MySQL ecosystem, such as Percona XtraBackup, did not support full backup capability for these features.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1引入了MariaDB独有的功能，例如InnoDB页面压缩和静态数据加密。这些专有功能在MariaDB用户中非常受欢迎。但是，MySQL生态系统中的现有备份解决方案（例如Percona XtraBackup）不支持这些功能的完整备份功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 introduces new, standards-compliant behavior for dealing with primary keys over nullable columns. In certain edge cases this could cause replication issues when replicating from a MariaDB 10.0 master to a MariaDB 10.1 slave using statement-based replication. See MDEV-12248.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1引入了新的，符合标准的行为，用于处理可空列上的主键。在某些情况下，使用基于语句的复制从MariaDB 10.0主服务器复制到MariaDB 10.1从服务器时，这可能会导致复制问题。参见MDEV-12248。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 is now the default mysql server in Debian 9 "Stretch". This page provides information on this change and instructions to help with upgrading your Debian 8 "Jessie" version of MySQL or MariaDB to MariaDB 10.1 in Debian 9 "Stretch".
trans-unit.target: 现在，MariaDB 10.1是Debian 9“ Stretch”中的默认mysql服务器。该页面提供了有关此更改的信息和说明，以帮助您将Debian 8“ Jessie”版本的MySQL或MariaDB升级到Debian 9“ Stretch”中的MariaDB 10.1。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1 merged Facebook's defragmentation code prepared for MariaDB by Matt, Seong Uck Lee from Kakao. The only major difference to Facebook's code and Matt’s patch is that MariaDB does not introduce new literals to SQL and makes no changes to the server code. Instead, OPTIMIZE TABLE is used and all code changes are inside the InnoDB/XtraDB storage engines.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1合并了来自来自Kakao的Matt，Seong Uck Lee为MariaDB准备的Facebook碎片整理代码。Facebook代码和Matt补丁的唯一主要区别是MariaDB不会在SQL中引入新的文字，并且不会更改服务器代码。相反，使用OPTIMIZE TABLE，所有代码更改都在InnoDB / XtraDB存储引擎内部。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.2 (based on MySQL 5.7) introduced persistent AUTO_INCREMENT (MDEV-6076) in a GA release before MySQL 8.0.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.2（基于MySQL 5.7）在MySQL 8.0之前的GA发行版中引入了持久性AUTO_INCREMENT（MDEV-6076）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.2 uses InnoDB as the default storage engine, rather than XtraDB, used in MariaDB 10.1 and before. See Why does MariaDB 10.2 use InnoDB instead of XtraDB? In most cases this should have minimal effect as the latest InnoDB has incorporated most of the improvements made in earlier versions of XtraDB. Note that certain XtraDB system variables are now ignored (although they still exist so as to permit easy upgrading).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.2使用InnoDB作为默认存储引擎，而不是在MariaDB 10.1和更早版本中使用的XtraDB 。请参阅为什么MariaDB 10.2为什么使用InnoDB而不是XtraDB？在大多数情况下，这应该会产生最小的影响，因为最新的InnoDB合并了XtraDB早期版本中所做的大部分改进。请注意，现在忽略了某些XtraDB系统变量（尽管它们仍然存在，以便于轻松升级）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.3 (based on MySQL 5.7) introduced instant ADD COLUMN (MDEV-11369) before MySQL.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.3（基于MySQL 5.7）在MySQL之前引入了即时ADD COLUMN（MDEV-11369）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.3 has a feature that should be interesting for MyRocks users. It is the gtid_pos_auto_engines option (MDEV-12179). This is a performance feature for replication slaves that use multiple transactional storage engines.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.3具有MyRocks用户应该感兴趣的功能。这是gtid_pos_auto_engines选项（MDEV-12179）。对于使用多个事务存储引擎的复制从属服务器，这是一项性能功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 5.3 (and later) enhances the implementation of BNL joins and provides a variety of block-based join algorithms that can be used for inner joins, outer joins, and semi-joins. Block-based join algorithms in MariaDB employ a join buffer to accumulate records of the first join operand before they start looking for matches in the second join operand.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 5.3（及更高版本）增强了BNL连接的实现，并提供了多种基于块的连接算法，可用于内部联接，外部联接和半联接。MariaDB中基于块的联接算法使用联接缓冲区来累积第一个联接操作数的记录，然后再开始在第二个联接操作数中查找匹配项。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB 5.3包含在二进制日志事件中包含校验和的功能。这是MySQL 5.6中相同功能的反向移植。它在MWL＃180中实现。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 5.3 introduced a rich set of optimizations for IN subqueries. Since then, it makes sense to convert an EXISTS subquery into an IN so that the new optimizations can be used.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 5.3为IN子查询引入了一系列丰富的优化。从那时起，将EXISTS子查询转换为IN是有意义的，以便可以使用新的优化方法。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 5.3 introduced enhancements to this feature. See Enhancements for START TRANSACTION WITH CONSISTENT SNAPSHOT.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 5.3引入了对该功能的增强。请参见使用一致快照开始交易的增强功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 5.3 introduced the system variable join_buffer_space_limit that limits the total memory used for join buffers in a query.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 5.3引入了系统变量join_buffer_space_limit，该变量限制了查询中用于连接缓冲区的总内存。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB & XtraDB Storage Engine
trans-unit.target: InnoDB和XtraDB存储引擎

trans-unit.source: InnoDB is probably the MariaDB component that most frequently causes a crash. In the error log, lines containing InnoDB messages generally start with "InnoDB:".
trans-unit.target: InnoDB可能是最常导致崩溃的MariaDB组件。在错误日志中，包含InnoDB消息的行通常以“ InnoDB：”开头。

trans-unit.source: XtraDB is the best choice in the majority of cases until MariaDB 10.1. It is a performance-enhanced fork of InnoDB and is MariaDB's default engine until MariaDB 10.1.
trans-unit.target: 在MariaDB 10.1之前，XtraDB是大多数情况下的最佳选择。它是InnoDB增强性能的分支，并且是MariaDB 10.1之前的默认引擎。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB file format (Antelope or Barracuda).
trans-unit.target: InnoDB文件格式（羚羊或梭子鱼）。

trans-unit.source: InnoDB file format.
trans-unit.target: InnoDB文件格式。

trans-unit.source: Lock mode. One of S (shared), X (exclusive), IS (intention shared), IX (intention exclusive row lock), S_GAP (shared gap lock), X_GAP (exclusive gap lock), IS_GAP (intention shared gap lock), IX_GAP (intention exclusive gap lock) or AUTO_INC (auto-increment table level lock).
trans-unit.target: 锁定模式。一个 S （共享）， X （不含）， IS （意向共享）， IX （意向排它行锁）， S_GAP （共享间隙锁）， X_GAP （异间隙锁）， IS_GAP （意向共享间隙锁）， IX_GAP （意向排他间隙锁）或 AUTO_INC （自动增量表级别锁）。

trans-unit.source: innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty: Total size of the dirty pages, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: innodb_buffer_pool_bytes_dirty：脏页的总大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty: Number of dirty pages in the Change Buffer.
trans-unit.target: Innodb_buffer_pool_pages_dirty：更改缓冲区中的脏页数。

trans-unit.source: innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free: How many times InnoDB was forced to flush dirty pages to write new data, because the buffer pool had no more free pages.
trans-unit.target: innodb_buffer_pool_wait_free：由于缓冲池没有更多的空闲页面，InnoDB被迫刷新脏页面以写入新数据的次数。

trans-unit.source: Innodb_defragment_compression_failures: Number of defragment re-compression failures
trans-unit.target: Innodb_defragment_compression_failures：碎片整理重新压缩失败的次数

trans-unit.source: Innodb_defragment_count: Number of defragment operations.
trans-unit.target: Innodb_defragment_count：碎片整理操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: Innodb_defragment_failures: Number of defragment failures.
trans-unit.target: Innodb_defragment_failures：碎片整理失败的次数。

trans-unit.source: innodb_adaptive_checkpoint; Use innodb_adaptive_flushing_method instead.
trans-unit.target: innodb_adaptive_checkpoint ; 请改用innodb_adaptive_flushing_method。

trans-unit.source: innodb_auto_lru_dump; Use innodb_buffer_pool_restore_at_startup instead (and innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup in MariaDB 10.0).
trans-unit.target: innodb_auto_lru_dump ; 使用innodb_buffer_pool_restore_at_startup来代替（innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup在MariaDB的10.0）。

trans-unit.source: innodb_blocking_lru_restore; Use innodb_blocking_buffer_pool_restore instead.
trans-unit.target: innodb_blocking_lru_restore ; 请改用innodb_blocking_buffer_pool_restore。

trans-unit.source: innodb_buffer_pool_size = 3G
trans-unit.target: innodb_buffer_pool_size = 3G

trans-unit.source: innodb_buffer_pool_size— 70% of available RAM
trans-unit.target: innodb_buffer_pool_size —可用RAM的70％

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment: Enable InnoDB defragmentation.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment：启用InnoDB碎片整理。

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment_fill_factor: Indicates how full defragmentation should fill a page.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment_fill_factor：指示完整的碎片整理应如何填充页面。

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment_fill_factor_n_recs: Number of records of space that defragmentation should leave on the page.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment_fill_factor_n_recs：应在页面上进行碎片整理的空间记录数。

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment_frequency: Maximum times per second for defragmenting a single index.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment_frequency：每秒对单个索引进行碎片整理的最大时间。

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment_n_pages: Number of pages considered at once when merging multiple pages to defragment.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment_n_pages：合并多个要进行碎片整理的页面时立即考虑的页面数。

trans-unit.source: innodb_defragment_stats_accuracy: Number of defragment stats changes there are before the stats are written to persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: innodb_defragment_stats_accuracy：在将碎片整理统计信息写入持久性存储之前，已对其进行了更改。

trans-unit.source: innodb_doublewrite - ON: When an IST occurs, want there to be no torn pages? (With FusionIO or other drives that guarantee atomicity, OFF is better.)
trans-unit.target: innodb_doublewrite-开：发生IST时，是否希望没有撕裂的页面？（使用FusionIO或其他保证原子性的驱动器，OFF更好。）

trans-unit.source: innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit - 2 or 0. IST or SST will recover from loss if you have 1.
trans-unit.target: innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit -2或0。如果您拥有1，则IST或SST将从丢失中恢复。

trans-unit.source: innodb_expand_import; Use innodb_import_table_from_xtrabackup instead.
trans-unit.target: innodb_expand_import ; 请改用innodb_import_table_from_xtrabackup。

trans-unit.source: innodb_extra_rsegments; Use innodb_rollback_segments instead.
trans-unit.target: innodb_extra_rsegments ; 请改用innodb_rollback_segments。

trans-unit.source: innodb_pass_corrupt_table; Use innodb_corrupt_table_action instead.
trans-unit.target: innodb_pass_corrupt_table ; 请改用innodb_corrupt_table_action。

trans-unit.source: innodb_safe_truncate system variable
trans-unit.target: innodb_safe_truncate系统变量

trans-unit.source: innodb_stats_auto_recalc - when set (the default), persistent statistics are automatically recalculated when the table changes significantly (more than 10% of the rows)
trans-unit.target: innodb_stats_auto_recalc-设置时（默认），当表发生显着变化（超过10％的行）时，将自动重新计算持久性统计信息

trans-unit.source: innodb_stats_persistent - when set (the default) enables InnoDB persistent statistics.
trans-unit.target: innodb_stats_persistent-设置时（默认值）启用InnoDB持久统计信息。

trans-unit.source: innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages - Number of index pages sampled (default 20) when estimating cardinality and statistics for indexed columns. Increasing this value will increases index statistics accuracy, but use more I/O resources when running ANALYZE TABLE.
trans-unit.target: innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages-估计索引列的基数和统计信息时采样的索引页数（默认为20）。增大此值将提高索引统计信息的准确性，但是在运行ANALYZE TABLE时会使用更多的I / O资源。

trans-unit.source: innodb_sync_spin_loops is a global variable.
trans-unit.target: innodb_sync_spin_loops是一个全局变量。

trans-unit.source: innodb_use_fallocate is switched ON (files are extended using posix_fallocate rather than writing zeros behind the end of file)
trans-unit.target: innodb_use_fallocate已 ON （使用 posix_fallocate 扩展文件，而不是在文件末尾写入零）

trans-unit.target: InnoDB存储格式（紧凑，冗余，动态或压缩）。

trans-unit.source: MySQL upstream bug #71095. In case of list columns partitioning it sometimes causes a false “impossible where” clause to be raised. This makes a wrong void result returned when it should not be void. There is no workaround but this bug should be hopefully fixed.
trans-unit.target: MySQL上游错误＃71095。在列表列分区的情况下，有时会引起错误的“不可能的位置”子句。当它不应该无效时，将返回错误的无效结果。没有解决方法，但是应该可以修复此错误。

trans-unit.source: Buildroot is a way to cross compile MariaDB and other packages into a root filesystem. In the menuconfig you need to enable "Enable C++ Support" first under "Toolchain". After C++ is enabled MariaDB is an option under "Target Packages" ->"Libraries" -> "Databases" -> "mysql support" -> "mysql variant" -> "mariadb". Also enable the "mariadb server" below the "mysql support" option.
trans-unit.target: Buildroot是将MariaDB和其他软件包交叉编译到根文件系统中的一种方法。在menuconfig中，您需要首先在“工具链”下启用“启用C ++支持”。启用C ++之后，MariaDB是“目标软件包”->“库”->“数据库”->“ mysql支持”->“ mysql变体”->“ mariadb”下的一个选项。同时启用“ mysql support”选项下面的“ mariadb server”。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0.5 moved to the PCRE regex library - see PCRE Regular Expressions for enhancements to REGEXP introduced in MariaDB 10.0.5.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5已移至PCRE regex库-有关MariaDB 10.0.5中引入的REGEXP的增强功能，请参见PCRE正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0.5 switched to the PCRE regular expression library for enhanced regular expression performance, and REGEXP_REPLACE was introduced as part of this enhancement.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5切换到PCRE正则表达式库以增强正则表达式性能，并且 REGEXP_REPLACE 作为此增强功能的一部分被引入。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0.5 switched to the PCRE regular expression library for enhanced regular expression performance, and REGEXP_SUBSTR was introduced as part of this enhancement.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5切换到PCRE正则表达式库以增强正则表达式性能，并引入了 REGEXP_SUBSTR 作为此增强的一部分。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0.5 switched to the PCRE regular expression library for enhanced regular expression performance, and REGEXP_INSTR was introduced as part of this enhancement.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5切换到PCRE正则表达式库以增强正则表达式性能，并引入了REGEXP_INSTR作为此增强的一部分。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.0.5 switched to the PCRE library, which significantly improved the power of the REGEXP/RLIKE operator.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.0.5切换到PCRE库，这大大提高了REGEXP / RLIKE运算符的功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.1 introduced the max_statement_time system variable. When set to a non-zero value, any queries taking longer than this time in seconds will be aborted. The default is zero, and no limits are then applied. The aborted query has no effect on any larger transaction or connection contexts.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.1引入了 max_statement_time 系统变量。当设置为非零值时，任何花费时间超过此时间（以秒为单位）的查询都将被中止。默认值为零，然后不应用任何限制。中止的查询对任何较大的事务或连接上下文均无效。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.1 merged the Facebook/Kakao defragmentation patch
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.1合并了Facebook / Kakao碎片整理补丁

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.1 merged the Facebook/Kakao defragmentation patch for defragmenting InnoDB tablespaces
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.1合并了Facebook / Kakao碎片整理补丁，以对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.1 merged the Facebook/Kakao defragmentation patch, allowing one to use OPTIMIZE TABLE to defragment InnoDB tablespaces. For this functionality to be enabled, the innodb_defragment system variable must be enabled. No new tables are created and there is no need to copy data from old tables to new tables. Instead, this feature loads n pages (determined by innodb-defragment-n-pages) and tries to move records so that pages would be full of records and then frees pages that are fully empty after the operation. Note that tablespace files (including ibdata1) will not shrink as the result of defragmentation, but one will get better memory utilization in the InnoDB buffer pool as there are fewer data pages in use.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.1合并了Facebook / Kakao碎片整理补丁程序，从而允许使用 OPTIMIZE TABLE 对InnoDB表空间进行碎片整理。要启用此功能，必须启用innodb_defragment系统变量。没有创建新表，也不需要将数据从旧表复制到新表。取而代之的是，此功能加载 n 页（由innodb-defragment-n-pages确定）并尝试移动记录，以便页面将充满记录，然后在操作后释放完全为空的页面。请注意，表空间文件（包括ibdata1）不会由于碎片整理而缩小，但是由于正在使用的数据页较少，因此InnoDB缓冲池中的表空间文件将获得更好的内存利用率。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.2 added the mysql56_temporal_format system variable, which enables a new MySQL 5.6-compatible storage format for the TIME, DATETIME and TIMESTAMP data types.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.2添加了 mysql56_temporal_format 系统变量，该变量为 TIME ， DATETIME 和 TIMESTAMP 数据类型启用了与MySQL 5.6兼容的新存储格式。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.2 introduced the --mysql56-temporal-format option, on by default, which allows MariaDB to store DATETMEs using the same low-level format MySQL 5.6 uses. For more information, see Internal Format, below.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.2引入了--mysql56-temporal-format选项，默认情况下处于启用状态，该选项允许MariaDB使用与MySQL 5.6使用的相同低级格式存储DATETME。有关更多信息，请参见下面的内部格式。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.2 introduced the --mysql56-temporal-format option, on by default, which allows MariaDB to store TIMESTAMPs using the same low-level format MySQL 5.6 uses.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.2引入了--mysql56-temporal-format选项，默认情况下处于启用状态，该选项允许MariaDB使用与MySQL 5.6使用的相同低级格式存储TIMESTAMP。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.2 introduced the --mysql56-temporal-format option, on by default, which allows MariaDB to store TIMEs using the same low-level format MySQL 5.6 uses.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.2引入了--mysql56-temporal-format选项，默认情况下处于启用状态，该选项允许MariaDB使用与MySQL 5.6使用的相同低级格式存储TIME。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.1.3 has introduced support for InnoDB/XtraDB data scrubbing. Background threads periodically scan tablespaces and logs and remove all data that should be deleted. The number of background threads for tablespace scans is set by innodb-encryption-threads. Log scrubbing happens in a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.1.3引入了对InnoDB / XtraDB数据清理的支持。后台线程定期扫描表空间和日志，并删除所有应删除的数据。表空间扫描的后台线程数由innodb-encryption-threads设置。日志清理在单独的线程中进行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.2.1 permits TEXT and BLOB data types to be assigned a DEFAULT value. As a result, from MariaDB 10.2.1, SHOW CREATE TABLE will append a DEFAULT NULL to nullable TEXT or BLOB fields if no specific default is provided.

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.4.0 supports instant DROP COLUMN. DROP COLUMN of an indexed column would imply DROP INDEX (and in the case of a non-UNIQUE multi-column index, possibly ADD INDEX). These will not be allowed with ALGORITHM=INSTANT, but unlike before, they can be allowed with ALGORITHM=NOCOPY
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.4.0支持即时DROP COLUMN。索引列的DROP COLUMN表示DROP INDEX（对于非UNIQUE多列索引，可能是ADD INDEX）。ALGORITHM = INSTANT不允许使用这些，但与以前不同，ALGORITHM = NOCOPY允许使用

trans-unit.source: MariaDB 10.4.3 introduces support for encrypting spatial indexes. To enable, set the innodb_checksum_algorithm to full_crc32 or to strict_full_crc32. Note that MariaDB only encrypts spatial indexes when the ROW_FORMAT table option is not set to COMPRESSED.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 10.4.3引入了对加密空间索引的支持。要启用，请将 innodb_checksum_algorithm 设置为 full_crc32 或 strict_full_crc32 。请注意，当 ROW_FORMAT 表选项未设置为 COMPRESSED 时，MariaDB仅加密空间索引。

trans-unit.source: Security-Enhanced Linux (SELinux) is a Linux kernel module that provides a framework for configuring mandatory access control (MAC) system for many resources on the system. It is enabled by default on some Linux distributions, including RHEL, CentOS, Fedora, and other similar Linux distribution. SELinux prevents programs from accessing files, directories or ports unless it is configured to access those resources.
trans-unit.target: 安全增强型Linux（SELinux）是Linux内核模块，它提供了一个框架，用于为系统上的许多资源配置强制性访问控制（MAC）系统。默认情况下，在某些Linux发行版（包括RHEL，CentOS，Fedora和其他类似的Linux发行版）中启用了此功能。SELinux禁止程序访问文件，目录或端口，除非将其配置为访问这些资源。

trans-unit.source: dbForge Data Generator is a powerful GUI tool for creating massive volumes of realistic test data. The tool includes a large collection of predefined data generators with customizable configuration options that allow to populate MariaDB database tables with meaningful data of various types.
trans-unit.target: dbForge数据生成器是一个功能强大的GUI工具，用于创建大量真实的测试数据。该工具包括大量预定义的数据生成器，这些数据生成器带有可自定义的配置选项，允许使用各种类型的有意义的数据填充MariaDB数据库表。

trans-unit.source: dbForge Data Compare serves for data comparison and synchronization in MariaDB, MySQL, Percona databases. It gives clear view of differences between data, allows analyzing them, generates synchronization script, and applies changes at a glance. It also allows scheduling regular data comparisons using command line interface.
trans-unit.target: dbForge Data Compare用于在MariaDB，MySQL，Percona数据库中进行数据比较和同步。它清晰地显示了数据之间的差异，允许对其进行分析，生成同步脚本并一目了然地应用更改。它还允许使用命令行界面安排定期的数据比较。

trans-unit.source: dbForge Fusion is a powerful Visual Studio plugin designed to simplify MariaDB database development and enhance data management capabilities. When you integrate dbForge Fusion into Microsoft Visual Studio, all database development and administration tasks become available from your IDE. It provides an easier way to explore and maintain existing databases, design compound SQL statements and queries, and manipulate data in different ways.
trans-unit.target: dbForge Fusion是一个功能强大的Visual Studio插件，旨在简化MariaDB数据库开发并增强数据管理功能。当您将dbForge Fusion集成到Microsoft Visual Studio中时，所有数据库开发和管理任务都可以从IDE中获得。它提供了一种更简单的方法来浏览和维护现有数据库，设计复合SQL语句和查询以及以不同方式操作数据。

trans-unit.source: dbForge Query Builder is a visual tool that allows creating any sort of SQL queries, from simple lookups to complex JOINs. The tool enables extended data management in MariaDB, MySQL, and Percona server databases. Create and edit any complex queries in just a few clicks. There is no need to type any code - just "draw" your query on a diagram. When you need to type some SQL code manually, comprehensive suggestions will simplify the task.
trans-unit.target: dbForge Query Builder是一个可视化工具，可用于创建从简单查找到复杂JOIN的各种SQL查询。该工具可在MariaDB，MySQL和Percona服务器数据库中实现扩展的数据管理。只需单击几下即可创建和编辑任何复杂的查询。无需键入任何代码-只需在图表上“绘制”查询即可。当您需要手动键入一些SQL代码时，全面的建议将简化任务。

trans-unit.source: dbForge Schema Compare performs schema comparison and synchronization, that supports MariaDB database servers as well as Percona and MySQL. The tool gives a comprehensive view of all differences between database schemas, generates a clear and accurate SQL synchronization script that can be used to update a database schema. Comparison tasks for schemas can be scheduled using the command line interface.
trans-unit.target: dbForge模式比较执行模式比较和同步，该模式支持MariaDB数据库服务器以及Percona和MySQL。该工具提供了数据库模式之间所有差异的全面视图，生成了清晰，准确的SQL同步脚本，可用于更新数据库模式。可以使用命令行界面计划架构的比较任务。

trans-unit.source: <<toc title='' layout=standalone>> MariaDB ColumnStore has the ability to change intermediate decimal mathematical results from decimal type to double. The decimal type has approximately 17-18 digits of precision, but a smaller maximum range. Whereas the double type has approximately 15-16 digits of precision, but a much larger maximum range. In typical mathematical and scientific applications, the ability to avoid overflow in intermediate results with double math is likely more beneficial than the additional two digits of precisions. In banking applications, however, it may be more appropriate to leave in the default decimal setting to ensure accuracy to the least significant digit.
trans-unit.target: <<toc title='' layout=standalone>> MariaDB ColumnStore能够将中间的十进制数学结果从十进制类型更改为双精度。十进制类型的精度大约为17-18位，但是最大范围较小。而double类型的精度大约为15-16位，但是最大范围要大得多。在典型的数学和科学应用中，使用双精度运算避免中间结果溢出的功能可能比精度的另外两位数字更有利。但是，在银行应用程序中，保留默认的十进制设置可能更合适，以确保最低有效位数的准确性。

trans-unit.source: <<unique_check_lag_threshold>>. This is FB/MySQL-5.6 feature where unique checks are disabled if replication lag exceeds a certain threshold.
trans-unit.target: <<unique_check_lag_threshold>> 。这是FB / MySQL-5.6功能，如果复制滞后超过特定阈值，则将禁用唯一检查。

trans-unit.source: '/*!40000 ALTER TABLE tb_name DISABLE KEYS */; and '/*!40000 ALTER TABLE tb_name ENABLE KEYS */; will be put in the output. This makes loading the dump file faster because the indexes are created after all rows are inserted. This option is effective only for non-unique indexes of MyISAM tables. Disable with --skip-disable-keys.
trans-unit.target: '/*!40000 ALTER TABLE tb_name DISABLE KEYS */; 和 '/*!40000 ALTER TABLE tb_name ENABLE KEYS */; 将被放置在输出中。这将加快加载转储文件的速度，因为在插入所有行之后都会创建索引。此选项仅对MyISAM表的非唯一索引有效。使用 --skip-disable-keys 禁用。

trans-unit.source: 'EXPLAIN tbl_name' is synonymous with 'DESCRIBE tbl_name' or 'SHOW COLUMNS FROM tbl_name'.
trans-unit.target: 'EXPLAIN tbl_name' 与 'DESCRIBE tbl_name' 或 'SHOW COLUMNS FROM tbl_name' 同义。

trans-unit.source: 'default_wait_timeout_value_in_seconds' is the default timeout for the WAIT_FOR action. If set to zero, the facility stays disabled.
trans-unit.target: 'default_wait_timeout_value_in_seconds' 是 WAIT_FOR 操作的默认超时。如果设置为零，则该设施保持禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: --binlog-ignore-db=database_name behaves differently depending on whether statement-based or row-based logging is used. For statement-based logging, the server will not log any statement where the default database is database_name. The default database is set with the USE statement.
trans-unit.target: --binlog-ignore-db=database_name 的行为取决于使用的是基于语句的日志记录还是基于行的日志记录。对于基于语句的日志记录，服务器将不会记录默认数据库为database_name的任何语句。默认数据库是使用USE语句设置的。

trans-unit.source: --binlog-ignore-db=database_name specified a database to ignore for logging purposes, while --binlog-do-db=database_name will not log any statements unless they apply to the specified database.
trans-unit.target: --binlog-ignore-db=database_name 指定了要记录的数据库而忽略，而 --binlog-do-db=database_name 不会记录任何语句，除非它们适用于指定的数据库。
